rationale: No intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual expectation ('anticipate new additional avian influenza detections will occur').
The segment describes anticipation ('anticipate'), not realised impact.
This segment reports anticipation of future detections without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment anticipates detections, but contains no negation.

Describes anticipation of detections as surveillance continues ('anticipate new additional avian influenza detections will occur...as wild bird surveillance continues') as preparedness/future possibility without active reassurance.
